txt.en: The road continues to the west, towards the Vales of Anduin.\n\nContinue to patrol the main road to the west for Orcs.

'After the Battle Under the Trees, many Orcs fled to the Emyn-nu-Fuin, cravenly hiding up in those hills from retribution. Even now they lurk in my domain. If I am to open westward trade once more, those paths must be made safe from the attacks of these Orcs.\n\n'Will you patrol the way between here and the Vales of Anduin, keeping an eye out for any Orc?'
Continue to patrol the road through Eryn Lasgalen for Orcs
Talk to H치llkell
'Dead... they're all dead... we were ambushed and - I tried to save them.'
Continue to patrol the road through Eryn Lasgalen for Orcs

The ambushed caravan can be found along the western end of the main road in Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou should investigate the caravan.
H치llkell can be found along the western end of the main road in Eryn Lasgalen.\n\nYou should talk to the merchant again.
If I am to open westward trade once more, those paths must be made safe.

The road continues east and west.\n\nContinue patrolling for Orcs along the main road to the west.
Having concluded the spiders have left Mirkwood, Thranduil focuses on keeping the roads safe in hope that trade can resume.
A caravan ahead has met with conflict
H치llkell is visibly shaken
'We were ambushed and... I tried, I did. But the spiders... spiders such as I have never seen and... I tried but I could not save them.'
